g) We must realistically recognize that the demand for service by
NAEB is always ahead of income from members. Therefore the
source of immediate financial support for Headquarters and Net¬
work, beyond present funds from Kellogg, with whom it should first
be discussed, must be found, unless Seminar and other upgrading
functions are to be drastically reduced, if not indeed entirely
curtailed.
